name: Single filer at high income
description: High earner at €100,000 in Spain - above Social Security max base

sources.description: Calculated using 2025 Spanish national IRPF rates, Social Security (capped), and solidarity contribution
sources.notes: National tax: 45% on €40,000 of income. SS capped at €58,914. Solidarity contribution 0.17% on €41,086 excess.
